name: Dumb
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: You are an October of my life. You feels like the first warmth of the sun and the gust of wind that blows my mind. Your smile is a golden drop of the ocean under the sunset and your voice is a sip of coffee in the midst of dawn.The earth fell in love with the rain nd fell in love with you again
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click Refresh, if you want to watch it again.
